ygData.subject: Re: Weapon vs. lvl site
ygData.msgSnippet: You should have the best stuff you can get . . . Questions like this are unanswerable, since it s a freeform, roleplaying game. Sure, someone s going to look
ygData.messageBody:
You should have the best stuff you can get . . .
Questions like this are unanswerable, since it's a
freeform, roleplaying game. Sure, someone's going to look
at your stuff and say you should be better equipped
(like last night in front of Kaladim), but it's really
hard to say. <br><br>Better off not worrying about it
and just enjoying the game. Or you could go to
www.eqprices.com and see what (inflated) prices are like. Then see
if you think you could afford
anything.<br><br>Kharlisht<br>28 Dwarf Rogue
